entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
